Order a British Columbian wine, like the crisp Burrowing Owl Pinot Gris.THE VIBE IS: noisy and fun, with customers catching up with their go-to bartenders and enjoying life, Cape Cod–style (a.k.a. wearing boat shoes).PRACTICAL STUFF: Open every day: Monday to Saturday, from 11:30 a.m. to 11 p.m.; and Sunday, from 4:30 p.m. to 11 p.m. You can reserve a spot by phone for either the raucous Yaletown original or the more intimate Gastown location.—Lindsay AndersonGrant HarderGrant HarderWE ALSO LOVEDock LunchMount Pleasant’s best-kept secret for lunch and a little readingGranville Island Public MarketAll the Canadian food (smoked salmon!) under one roof KishimotoThe Drive’s no-frills standby for impeccable sushiExplore City GuidesAtlantaAustinBostonCharlestonChicagoCopenhagenLas VegasLondonLos AngelesMexico CityMiamiMontrealNew OrleansNew YorkParisPhiladelphiaPortlandSan FranciscoSeattleTokyoTorontoVancouverWashington, D.C.GET THE MAGAZINEBA LogoBon appetitSUBSCRIBESign up for Updates on the Bon AppétitCity GuidesSign UpWill be used in accordance with our user agreement and privacy policyBA LogoBon appetitSubscription FAQsMastheadNewsletter SignupAccessibility HelpRSS FeedsSite MapCondé Nast StoreCareersBon Appétit Media KitDo Not Sell My Personal InformationCondé NastFood Innovation Group: Bon Appétit and Epicurious© 2022 Condé Nast.
